name: razor-fang
effect: Held: When the holder attacks with most damaging moves, provides an extra 11.7% (30/256) chance for the target to flinch. Held by Gligar: Evolves the holder into Gliscor when it levels up.
short_effect: Held: Damaging moves gain a 10% chance to make their target flinch. Held by a Gligar while levelling up: Holder evolves into Gliscor.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder successfully inflicts damage, the target may also flinch.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder successfully inflicts damage, the target may also flinch.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder successfully inflicts damage, the target may also flinch.
